titles.title: Recognizing and appreciating the historical significance and the heroic human endeavor and sacrifice of the people of Crete during World War II and commending the PanCretan Association of America.
Recognizing and appreciating the historical significance and the heroic human endeavor and sacrifice of the people of Crete during World War II and commending the PanCretan Association of America.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

bill.summary:
Observes the memory of the fallen heroes of the Battle of Crete, and honors the living men and women of Crete who fought an oppressive invader to preserve freedom in World War II.
Commends the PanCretan Association of America for preserving and promoting the history of Crete and its people.
